https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4NxVSsaKggez8CN0SOilAmCXaXK.jpg Clara and her boyfriend break up their relationship in Paris. She stays a few days in the city, where he meets a man who offers her work. But, unexpectedly, love again knocking on her door. Ein Sommer in Paris
